author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF- Collabos to offer off-floor distribution of shares
text:
Feb 21(Reuters) - Collabos Corp
* Says it will offer an off-floor distribution of 71,300 shares (the amount will become 213,900 shares, due to stock split effective on March 1), on Tokyo Stock Exchange between March 9 and March 15
* Offering price will be determined based on the closing share price of the day before the distribution
* Says the limitation for distribution is up to 100 shares for each customer
Source text in Japanese: goo.gl/MLHLh1
Further company coverage: (Beijing Headline News)
